text: A.K.A. is the eighth studio album by American singer and entertainer Jennifer Lopez. It was released June 13, 2014 by Capitol Records. It features guest appearances from a wide range of rappers such as Nas, Iggy Azalea, French Montana, T.I. and Rick Ross. The album returns Lopez to her hip hop and R&B; roots. == Track listing == ==Charts== Chart (2014) Peak position Chinese Albums (Sino Chart) 29 Croatian Albums (Toplista) 12 Greek Albums (IFPI Greece) 4 Italian Albums (FIMI) 13 Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) 33 Russian Albums (NFPP) 4 === Year-end charts === Chart (2014) Position US Billboard R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 50 == Release history == Country Date Edition(s) Label GermanyRelease of A.K.A. in Germany: * * June 13, 2014 Universal NetherlandsRelease of A.K.A. in the Netherlands: * * United KingdomRelease of A.K.A. in the United Kingdom: * * June 16, 2014 Capitol CanadaRelease of A.K.A. in Canada: * * June 17, 2014 Universal PolandRelease of A.K.A. in Poland: * * SpainRelease of A.K.A. in Spain: * * United StatesRelease of A.K.A. in the United States: * * Capitol Japan June 18, 2014 Standard Universal AustraliaRelease of A.K.A. in Australia: * * June 20, 2014 BrazilRelease of A.K.A. in Brazil: * Standard FranceRelease of A.K.A. in France: * * June 30, 2014 ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Jennifer Lopez albums Category:Pop albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Capitol Records albums
